title: Point Reyes National Seashore: Limantour Road
body: Directions to Park Destinations via Limantour Road       Directions to Sky Trailhead Allow 10 minutes for the drive from the Bear Valley Visitor Center.  From the Bear Valley Visitor Center, head north 0.2 miles (0.3 km) to Bear Valley Road. Turn left and follow Bear Valley Road 1.25 miles (2 km) northwest to Limantour Road, signed for “Hostel and Limantour Beach.” Turn left and follow Limantour Road 3.4 miles (5.4 km) west to the Sky Trailhead, which is located on the left side of the road.  Top of Page      Directions to Bayview Trailhead Allow 10 minutes for the drive from the Bear Valley Visitor Center.  From the Bear Valley Visitor Center, head north 0.2 miles (0.3 km) to Bear Valley Road. Turn left and follow Bear Valley Road 1.25 miles (2 km) northwest to Limantour Road, signed for “Hostel and Limantour Beach.” Turn left and follow Limantour Road 4.4 miles (7 km) west to the Bayview Trailhead, which is located on the right side of the road.  Top of Page      Directions to the Point Reyes Hostel. the Laguna Trailhead, and the Clem Miller Environmental Education Center Allow 15 minutes for the drive from the Bear Valley Visitor Center.  From the Bear Valley Visitor Center, head north 0.2 miles (0.3 km) to Bear Valley Road. Turn left and follow Bear Valley Road 1.25 miles (2 km) northwest to Limantour Road, signed for “Hostel and Limantour Beach.” Turn left and follow Limantour Road 5.9 miles (9.4 km) west. After descending a very steep hill, you will arrive at a crossroads signed for “Hostel and Education Center”. Turn left and proceed carefully along this one-lane wide driveway. The northern end of the Coast Trail is on the right side of the road at 0.25 miles (0.4 km). The Hostel is on the left side of the road after 0.3 miles (0.5 km). The Laguna Trailhead parking area is on the right side of the road after 0.5 miles (0.8 km). The Education Center is at the end of the road.  Note: Vehicles more than 24 feet long are not permitted on the road leading to the Education Center. Buses carrying groups headed to the Education Center will need to park and unload in the parking area on the left side of the road located 5.5 miles (8.8 km) along Limantour Road. Top of Page      Directions to the Muddy Hollow Trailhead Allow 15 minutes for the drive from the Bear Valley Visitor Center.  From the Bear Valley Visitor Center, head north 0.2 miles (0.3 km) to Bear Valley Road. Turn left and follow Bear Valley Road 1.25 miles (2 km) northwest to Limantour Road, signed for “Hostel and Limantour Beach.” Turn left and follow Limantour Road 5.9 miles (9.4 km) west. After descending a very steep hill, you will arrive at a crossroads signed for “Hostel and Education Center” and “Muddy Hollow Trail”. Turn right and descend a short hill about 0.25 miles (0.4 km) to the Muddy Hollow Trailhead parking lot.  Top of Page      Directions to Limantour Beach Allow 20 minutes for the drive from the Bear Valley Visitor Center.  From the Bear Valley Visitor Center, head north 0.2 miles (0.3 km) to Bear Valley Road. Turn left and follow Bear Valley Road 1.25 miles (2 km) northwest to Limantour Road, signed for “Hostel and Limantour Beach.” Turn left and follow Limantour Road 7.5 miles (12 km) west to the parking lot at Limantour Beach.
